statements: UPDATE social_media_data SET sentiment_score = 4.2 WHERE post_id = 100;
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_date = '2022-01-20 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 500;
UPDATE social_media_data SET platform = 'Twitter', post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = 101 AND user_id = 201;
UPDATE social_media_data SET sentiment_score = 4.8, post_date = '2022-03-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = 202 AND post_id = 102;

UPDATE trend_prediction SET trend_name = 'Technology Trends' WHERE prediction_id = 56789;
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_content = 'New Post Content', sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE trend_prediction SET confidence_score = 0.9, trend_name = 'New Trend Name' WHERE prediction_id = 2;

UPDATE social_media_posts SET platform = 'Twitter', post_content = 'Great news today!' WHERE post_id = 3

UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_content = 'New post content', platform = 'Twitter' WHERE sentiment_score < 5

UPDATE user_profile SET followers_count = 1500, platform = 'Twitter' WHERE user_id = 201;

UPDATE comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment' WHERE comment_id = 54321;
